<https://pivotal.io/forrester-wave-in-memory-data-grids?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=forrester-wave-q315> Pivotal wants to help you stay on top of emerging trends in the dynamic big data market. Please enjoy this complimentary report from Forrester Research, Inc.
The Forrester Wave: In-Memory Data Grids, Q3 2015 <https://pivotal.io/forrester-wave-in-memory-data-grids?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=forrester-wave-q315> <https://pivotal.io/forrester-wave-in-memory-data-grids?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=forrester-wave-q315>Blazing fast application performance – it’s what customers want and what every application development professional needs to deliver. There’s no better way to achieve it than RAM, which combines low-latency data access with distributed computing for reliability and scale.
Forrester Research evaluated 11 companies delivering this capability (called in-memory data grids) across 32 criteria and positioned Pivotal as a Leader.
Check out additional research and resources here <http://pivotal.io/resources> or contact us <http://pivotal.io/contact>. We’d be happy to help you become a leader as well, by advancing your software-driven experiences.
The Pivotal Team
